text: Ni munkolangagani Allah m’moŵa gakuŵalanjika (gagali moŵa gatatu panyuma pa lisiku lya idi ya mfungotatu), nambo jwachachelenje pa (gamba kutama) moŵa gaŵilipe (ni kuŵigulaga) chaŵe jwangali ulemwa, nombe jwachachelewele (pakumalisya moŵa ganagatatu) chaŵe soni jwangali ulemwa, kwa mundu jwachaŵe ni woga, ni mun'jogopani Allah, soni manyililani yanti ŵanganyammwe Kukwakwe chinchisonganganyisyidwa
